o:ExtendedAttributeTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_NumberOfJoinConditions
o:ExtendedAttributeTargetItem.a:Creator: RichaneRamsoedit
o:ExtendedAttributeTargetItem.a:GetMethodScript:
Function %Get%(obj) Dim joinConditions Dim joinCondition Dim joinCount joinCount = 0
If Not obj Is Nothing Then Set joinConditions = obj.GetExtendedCollection("mdde_JoinConditions", False)
If Not joinConditions Is Nothing Then For Each joinCondition In joinConditions joinCount = joinCount + 1 Next End If End If
%Get% = joinCount End Function
o:ExtendedAttributeTargetItem.a:Label: No. of Join Conditions
